attributes.action: Get the police to send the greedy bankers to jail.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'd like the prime minister to inform the police about these greedy bankers so they can be sent to jail. Plus, to solve the credit crunch by giving them a billion pound fine because the money doesn't rightfully belong to them. We then use that money to finish the credit crunch by lending the money to businesses.

rejection.details: The PM can not send people to jail. This is a matter for police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
